attributes.action: arrange a scheme where we earn money by recycling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it would get more people recycling, even if your getting 1p for every item you recycle people would do it, or do it according to weight.it would stop the roads being litterd in cans. and it would encourage recycling

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
